project.ss.engine
Interface Player

All Known Subinterfaces:
ControledPlayer
All Known Implementing Classes:
ControledPlayerImpl
public interface Player

This interface provides the abstraction for playing back of the audio. The Player describes very primary capabilities to play and stop audio It also provides the option to dump the audio being played back Player assumes that the SourceDataLine will be used to feed the data to be played.

Method Summary
 java.io.File getDumpFile()
          Returns the file currently in use for dumping the audio
 javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine getSourceDataLine()
          Return the Source Data Line which is currently responsible for playing audio.
 void play()
          Starts playing the audio
 void setDumpFile(java.io.File dmpFile)
          Sets the file where audio data will be dumped
 void setSourceDataLine(javax.sound.sampled.SourceDataLine srcDataLine)
          Sets the new Source Data Line which will be used from now to playback the audio
 void stop()
          Stop the audio play back
